#create a new shortcut of shutdown $ShutdownShortcutPath = "$env:ProgramData\Microsoft\Windows\Start Menu\Programs\Shutdown.lnk" $ShutdownShortcut = $WshShell.CreateShortcut($ShutdownShortcutPath) $ShutdownShortcut.TargetPath = "$env:SystemRoot\System32\shutdown.exe" $ShutdownShortcut.Arguments = "-s -t 0" $ShutdownShortcut.Save()
#change the default icon of shutdown shortcut $ShutdownLnk = $Desktop.ParseName($ShutdownShortcutPath) $ShutdownLnkPath = $ShutdownLnk.GetLink $ShutdownLnkPath.SetIconLocation("$env:SystemRoot\System32\SHELL32.dll",27) $ShutdownLnkPath.Save()
